author: cframpton
msg: Fix up as many copyrights as I could in the velocity and batik forks so RAT wouldn't call them out, add their NOTICE and LICENSE files to the META-INF directories as required and add Implementation Vendor-Id to all the manifest.  The manifests still need work since there seem to be even more properties required/suggested.
